shortDescription: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the Marketo MA module before 7.x-1.5 for Drupal allow remote authenticated users with certain permissions to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via vectors related to field titles to the (1) Webform or (2) User sub-modules.
vulnerabilityName: marketo_ma_project marketo_ma Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
